ch0245_00_mary/0101_0701_01_10:
Mornin’, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You’re goin’
exploring again today, aren’t ya?
ch0245_00_mary/0101_0701_02_10:
I’ll be waitin’ here for ya, so don’t forget to come
get me when you’re ready to go!
ch0245_00_mary/7101_0701_01_10:
I love all kinds of battles, but my favorite are
stadium battles, y’know?
ch0245_00_mary/7101_0701_02_10:
My Pokémon and I really drive the audience wild
with all our moves and battle tactics!
ch0245_00_mary/7101_0701_03_10: It’s really nice when people cheer for us!
ch0245_00_mary/7102_0701_01_10:
Hmm... I need to get it lookin’ a little
more natural...
ch0245_00_mary/7102_0701_02_10:
H-hey! How long have you been there watchin’
me?! Th-this is too embarassin’!
ch0245_00_mary/7102_0701_03_10: What am I doin’? I’m practicin’ my smile!
ch0245_00_mary/7102_0701_04_10:
I’ve gotta have a proper smile to show all the
people cheerin’ for me!
ch0245_00_mary/7103_0701_01_10:
What’s my favorite Pokémon type, you ask? Dark,
of course!
ch0245_00_mary/7103_0701_02_10:
Some Dark-type Pokémon can give off a kinda
scary impression...
ch0245_00_mary/7103_0701_03_10:
but there’s nothin’ better than makin’ a real
heart-to-heart connection with one of them!
ch0245_00_mary/7104_0701_01_10:
Team Yell is a group of my fans who follow me
around, cheerin’ for me.
ch0245_00_mary/7104_0701_02_10:
They didn’t come with me to Pasio, but I’m sure
they’re still cheerin’ me on back in my hometown.
ch0245_00_mary/7104_0701_03_10:
Just thinkin’ about that makes me wanna go battle
right now!
ch0245_00_mary/7105_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Have you been
off trainin’ again?
ch0245_00_mary/7105_0701_02_10:
I think being able to work hard like that is a skill
all on its own! My big brother’s the same way...
ch0245_00_mary/7105_0701_03_10:
That’s why I’m cheerin’ both of you on from the
sidelines just like Team Yell does for me!
ch0245_00_mary/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh, there you are! I’ve got somethin’ important to
give you.
ch0245_00_mary/1701_0701_02_10:
It’d make me really happy if you could put it to
good use.
ch0245_00_mary/1701_0702_01_10:
Presents make the giver happy, too, y’know. Keep
that in mind, and use it however ya like!
ch0245_00_mary/2501_0701_01_10: Have you got any brothers or sisters?
ch0245_00_mary/2501_0701_02_10:
I’ve got a big brother named Piers. He’s a singer
and songwriter who’s also a Gym Leader!
ch0245_00_mary/2501_0701_03_10:
People say he seems a little standoffish, but he’s
actually super nice, despite his appearance!
ch0245_00_mary/2501_0702_01_10: I used to just cry all the time.
ch0245_00_mary/2501_0702_02_10:
But then my big brother caught me a Pokémon,
and that changed everythin’!
ch0245_00_mary/2501_0702_03_10: He’s the best big bro anyone could ask for!
ch0245_00_mary/2511_0701_01_10:
There are so many Trainers from so many different
regions here on Pasio.
ch0245_00_mary/2511_0701_02_10:
Keepin’ an eye on all the different sync pairs here
gives me lots of ideas for Pokémon battles and
even fashion!
ch0245_00_mary/2511_0701_03_10:
Everyone’s watchin’ when I battle, y’know? I can’t
go out in an embarrassin’ outfit!
ch0245_00_mary/2511_0702_01_10:
Hey, I have an idea! Why don’t you come help me
look for clothes for a bit?
ch0245_00_mary/2511_0702_02_10:
I can even help choose somethin’ that’ll look good
on you while we’re at it!
ch0245_00_mary/3001_0701_01_10:
Mornin’. Your mates already left to go trainin’,
y’know. Not that they’re gonna pass me by...
I’ve got my own plans.
ch0245_00_mary/3003_0701_01_10:
I really love this outfit, but it does get a bit hot
when the sun’s out. S’ppose it’s not quite right for
a day like today, is it?
ch0245_00_mary/3005_0701_01_10:
Out givin’ it your all, even this late, huh? Care for
a quick battle before you’re off to beddy-byes?
